
LICENSE

The demo images are distributed for free under the MIT open source license (SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT).

The demo images also include third-party libraries that may use an open source license other than MIT. Those can be found inside the image in the /usr/share/common-licenses directory.

The source code to build those images can be downloaded from https://github.com/aws4embeddedlinux/meta-aws-demos/releases

The demo images are are for experimental and development, not ready for production. When developing a production image based on those be careful about the licenses included in the image.
